resources.string: Long press on a tile to put a flag on it.
Shake your device to reveal all the bombs and continue playing.

Unicorn sweeper is a version of the popular minesweeper game but for unicorn lovers. It was developed with much excitement and love to spread the word about the power of unicorns and bring happiness to your day. 

Please enjoy and leave suggestions or ideas that will make this game better, if you have any.


Let's do the magic!
